lom:description.lom:string: Type: Institutional Transformation. Year Awarded: 2008. Description: The Michigan State project will apply a human resources methodology called Strategic Human Resource Management to the institution in order to achieve gender equity, incorporating all levels of administrative leadership. The application of this model is novel to academic faculty at an institution of higher education and will contribute to our understanding of institutional transformation.

lom:keyword.lom:string: ADVANCE - NSF, gender equity, women in science, women in mathematics, women in engineering, women in computing

lom:title.lom:string: NSF ADVANCE Program at Michigan State University
